The vegetable is cucumber.
Cucumbers are a type of edible plant that belongs to the gourd family.
The cucumber is a widely cultivated plant in the gourd family, Cucurbitaceae. It is a creeping vine that bears cucumiform fruits that are used as vegetables.
Cucumbers are a great source of vitamin K, vitamin C, magnesium and potassium. They also contain vitamin A, vitamin B1, vitamin B6, and vitamin B5.
